basics.name: Alexandre Gaudencio
basics.label: Front-end developer
basics.summary: Hello, I am Alexandre and I am a front-end developer. I currently live in the beautiful city of Lyon. I love building good UIs and bringing the users the best experience I can. Also, my code doesn't wear semicolons, but it's fine.

work.summary: Netvibes.com is the most awarded startpage where millions of people around the world personalize and publish all aspects of their daily digital lives.
highlights: Fully in charge of the front-end (and some backend) of [Misodata](http://goo.gl/4j5jcc)
New wysiwyg editor to allow our clients to custom their personnal [email campaigns](http://blog.netvibes.com/new-pushmail-editor-now-available/)

work.summary: Edagora's specialty is connecting people through phone with an emphasis on secure payments and privacy.
highlights: Chat counselling. I was in charge of both the server and the client
Rewrote the whole agenda system to make it simpler and more efficient
Full stack admin solution to keep track of all the counsellings

work.summary: Developped as our graduation project, Agrego is an open source network link agregator written in C. You want to have faster a connection but your provider can't offer you that? Why not put two together and add their performance?!
highlights: Learned about how to create virtual interfaces and use them

education.studyType: BTS Systèmes électroniques (Equivalent to an Associate Degree with Electronics major)
Baccalauréat STI GE (Equivalent to High School diploma with Electronics major)

references.name: Marcio Costa Silva
references.reference: Alexandre is a passionate developer with great skills. He is able to deal with problems and solve them. He is also a calm person who knows exactly how to handle pressure and has the ability to learn and understand things fast.
